entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
